abstract.t: This document describes the Multicast extension for the OptimizedLink State Routing protocol(MOLSR). MOLSR is designed for mobilerouters, and works in a heterogenous network composed of simple OLSRrouters, MOLSR routers and hosts. In the last part of this documentwe introduce also a Wireless Internet Group Management Protocol(WIGMP). It offers the possibility for OLSR nodes (without multicastcapabilities) to join multicast groups and receive multicast data.
